Content:: Leuven University Press (Dutch: Universitaire Pers Leuven) is a university press located in Leuven, Belgium. It was established in 1971 in association with KU Leuven.[2] It publishes about forty books a year, with about half being in English or in combined French, German, and Italian, and the other half being in Dutch.[2] This article about a publishing company is a stub.
